title: What happens if you let the Minions do all the work?
body: It's been on my mind for a good year or two now; Say you start a game and don't kill a single lane minion; Who would win? Who would destroy a team's nexus first?

replies.body:
search up red mercy 'league of myths'


one of his videos shows it .

On the old map, quite some time ago I think I once read that if you just let the game be, purple team (today's red team) would eventually win.

Not sure if it's still the same now with the changes between all this time.
both true, its 50% err on the side of purple side. always has been. it depends on how the first wave of minions focus. but yeah, like 50.00001% for purple and 49.999999 or w.e for blue.
Nah now it's just a 50/50 chance I think, since I've seen quite a few of these scenarios when playing stuff such as summoner's rift hide n seek, all jungle and some other game modes.
Purple/Red side, it's minions are stronger and have better AI to accommodate the trashy angle of the HUD.
